name: SHMUP Unity Starter Project
description:
Shoot-em-up Starter Project for Unity

This is a beginner friendly unity project that is ready to be played. As a player, you can move around the space and fire lasers at incoming enemy fighters. If you collide twice with the enemy, then you lose and the game restarts.

Created with Unity 2019.4.21f

Contents

  • Ship controller
  • Basic Enemy
  • Game manger that will handle enemy spawning and game restarting
  • Space Shoot Redux art asset pack by Kenny

This whole project is a revised and simplified version of the SHMUP tutorial in "Introduction to Game Design, Prototyping, and Development: From Concept to Playable Game with Unity and C#"

Art Assets from Kenny
https://kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-redux
